title: Position
description: Single position data point produced by a tracking device.

timestamp.description: Timestamp for the given position data in ISO 8601 format.

fixFailed.description: [Optional] Indicates that no position data could be acquired at the given time and the included data may be a cached position or invalid.

heartbeat.description: [Optional] Indicates that this position relates to a scheduled heartbeat and not a movement event. Inverse to 'inTrip' produced by Qyster devices.

deviceType.description: [Optional] The type of the sending device.

deviceID.description: Unique (case insensitive) identifier for the sending device.

original.description: [Optional] The original message sent by the device. No schema requirements.
